definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Expressing opinions is one example of culture difference between east and west.

sentences.english: His translations of Sino-Western cultural classics have made a great contribution to Sino-Western cultural exchanges.

definition: sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject
Western learning (intellectual movement in the late Qing)/also called 洋務運動|洋务运动
Chinese written language/Chinese literature esp. as taught abroad
